item.title: Speaking against Stigma
item.author: Emily Thomas,
item.description: We need to end the deafening silence – Robbie Lawlor is the charming charismatic Mr Gay Ireland. A Zoology graduate with the kind of accent romcom producers ditch their fiancées and invest in fisherman jumpers to be with. He’s also HIV Positive. That shouldn’t matter. Except it does. “When I was …
